snippet.title: Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition (Gameplay Trailer)
snippet.description:
Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition is a local party game for 2-4 players. Throw buckets on the heads of other players, push them off a ledge and be the last one standing. Battle against your friends through a collection of unique maps and pick your favorite player characters from a colorful catalog of cute animals. Watch out for golden buckets and various hazards scattered across the arenas!

Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition is an early student project version of the upcoming game Bucket Brawl. Bucket Brawl: Ahlman Edition will be released on Steam in May 2023. Follow us on social media to stay updated on the development of Bucket Brawl!

https://linktree.com/bucketbrawl

#bucketbrawl
